name: Ext_R5_MedicationDispense_receiver
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MedicationDispense.receiver for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationDispense.receiver from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationDispense|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Who collected the medication or where the medication was delivered
element.definition: Identifies the person who picked up the medication or the location of where the medication was delivered.  This will usually be a patient or their caregiver, but some cases exist where it can be a healthcare professional or a location.
element.comment: `MedicationDispense.receiver` maps to R4B `MedicationDispense.receiver`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RelatedPerson)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Location)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PractitionerRole)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
